Description: Brown pottery bowl, incomplete, hemispherical, with traces of a red-brown slip and white finger-painted decoration on the interior.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 226)
